resources.string:
Dear Administrators of the app, You need to update all the job Update as soon as possible. 

 Make sure that you checked for the new applicant so that you can go through the verification and further process. 

 Also check weather the app is working efficiently or not, if found any error then contact to the database administrators.

Regularly check the app to get updated job details. 

 If you are new to this app , then update your profile by today, So that can give priority that you prefer. 

 If you are an existing user then you can search for job. 

 We provide you all updated job details as much as we can.

It is a Job Notification App Of Assam. 

 It Is One Of Our Forward Step Towards Making Digital Assam. 

 You will get notification just after few moment of declaring the vacancy 

 of the job by corresponding department.

1. As you Know this app Displays your Contact Information and Address and your documents to its Administrators, 

 the person who will verify all your information. 2. We only view your documents and contact information by the purpose of verification.

 so that we will check and help you to generate an employee exchange no and get the 

 instant job(Govt, Private) notification. 3. Any Misuse of your phone number and Email address may occur from the hacker side. 

 but we can assure that no mis-leading or misuse of your personal , educational 

 information or your document can occur or happen from our administrators side. 4. By Accepting Terms and Condition, You are giving your consent to show your Information to app users.

 5. Developer of this app are not responsible for any misuse and spam on your mobile number and Email.

Developed By : - 
 InfoExc Technology 

 visit us at - www.infoExc.com 
 E-mail - infoexc.tech@gmail.com
One initiative towards make assam digitize
We bring you list of all available job advertisement.\n Help Your self by aceiving one.\n All the best.
Please Register To The App For Make Available The Latest Feature
Here is the list of all available job. Check for yourself
Here you go with you the job you prefer. Click the job for further information.
